summary.title: Summary
summary.intro: Senior .NET Software Developer with over 15 years of experience designing, architecting, and delivering complex software solutions across desktop, web, and cloud platforms. Proven expertise in translating business requirements into scalable architectures, leading development teams, and driving technical excellence in AI-powered medical platforms, enterprise ERP, CRM, and integration systems. Skilled in modern .NET technologies, microservices, and high-performance multithreaded applications. Adept at mentoring teams, optimizing CI/CD pipelines, and conducting thorough code reviews. Passionate about research-driven problem solving and continuous learning to deliver robust, maintainable, and efficient software.
skills: Technical Leadership & Architecture: System Design / Problem Solving / Project Management / Technical Expertise
.NET: C# / WPF / Avalonia UI / Entity Framework / ASP.NET Core / Serilog / Autofac / MediatR
Databases: MS SQL / PostgreSQL / MariaDB / MongoDB
Integrations: JSON / XML / SOAP / REST / gRPC / RabbitMQ / Robot Framework
DevOps: Docker / Kubernetes (k8s) / Linux / GitLab CI/CD / Proxmox / Nginx
Testing: Unit Testing / Integration Testing / End-to-End (E2E) / xUnit / Moq
Third-Party Application Research and Reverse Engineering

schools.name: Moscow University for Industry and Finance

jobs.title: .NET Senior Software Developer
jobs.description: Lead the architecture and development of a modern, multi-platform desktop application for an AI-powered cloud medical platform.

responsibilities.title: Development of a modern multi-platform desktop application based on .NET 8 Avalonia UI
details: Implemented high-speed, multithreaded processing and uploading of 2D/3D medical images
Architected and developed plug-ins for third-party medical software (official and unsupported)
Built logging, metrics, and configuration management modules
Developed application installation and update modules
Re-architected the application from monolithic to client-server architecture using gRPC
Wrote unit and integration tests using xUnit and Moq

responsibilities: Designed and developed a new appointment scheduling application with integration to third-party systems (.NET 8 Avalonia UI)
Architected and developed a companion web application using .NET 8, ASP.NET Core, and MongoDB
Analyzed, reverse-engineered, and integrated third-party applications and services using Robot Framework (RPA), databases, REST APIs, and more
Maintained and optimized CI/CD pipelines using GitLab
Conducted code reviews, mentored developers, and participated in technical interviews

Tech stack summary: .NET 7/8, Avalonia UI, xUnit, Moq, Autofac, Serilog, MediatR, Dapper, DynamicData, Fluent*, fo-dicom, gRPC, Hangfire, LiteDB, SQLite, Entity Framework, ONNX, NAPS2, ImageSharp, CommunityToolkit.Mvvm, NAudio, Velopack, ASP.NET Core, MongoDB

jobs.title: Senior Software Developer / Team Lead
jobs.description: Led development teams of 3-17 members as technical architect and team lead. Designed and developed scalable application architectures, focusing on performance optimization and timely project delivery. Created enterprise integrations between various systems using REST, SOAP, OData, SQL, RabbitMQ, XML, and JSON, connecting applications like 1C, SAP, and DAX. Specialized in SQL performance optimization and database efficiency improvements.

jobs.title: Software Development Engineer
jobs.description: Delivered comprehensive software solutions across multiple domains. Developed complex integrations between SharePoint, Project Server, and 1C enterprise systems. Built custom ERP solutions for oil service and manufacturing companies, implementing industry-specific requirements and optimizing business processes through web-based and desktop applications.

jobs.title: Team Lead, Senior Software Development Engineer
jobs.description: Managed full lifecycle of ERP-class corporate software implementation and development. Successfully integrated diverse systems including ACMS, CAD, MES, vending machines, dashboards, and Telegram bots to create a unified enterprise ecosystem. Led development teams and maintained system stability while implementing continuous improvements and optimizations.

jobs.title: Software Development Engineer
jobs.description: Specialized in 1C:Enterprise platform development and technical support. Provided expertise in application customization, troubleshooting, and business process automation. Delivered tailored solutions for financial services industry requirements while ensuring system reliability and performance.
